short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To help your productivity! (Keeping tabs on your break)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bombo is a productivity extension! Simply enter in how long you'd like your break to last and Bombo will close any *new* tabs and windows when the timer goes off! Don't worry though, it won't touch anything that was already there :)
